typeSystemDescription.name: Document Meta Data
typeSystemDescription.description:
Meta data about a document.

In addition to the features given here, there is a language feature inherited from UIMA's {@link DocumentAnnotation}. DKPro Core components expect a two letter ISO 639-1 language code there.
typeSystemDescription.vendor: Ubiquitous Knowledge Processing (UKP) Lab, Technische Universit√§t Darmstadt

featureDescription.name: documentTitle
featureDescription.description: The human readable title of the document.

featureDescription.name: collectionId
featureDescription.description: The ID of the whole document collection.

featureDescription.name: isLastSegment
featureDescription.description: CAS de-multipliers need to know whether a CAS is the last multiplied segment. Thus CAS multipliers should set this field to true for the last CAS they produce.

featureDescription.name: layer
featureDescription.description: The layer to which the tagset applies. This is typically the name of an UIMA type such as "de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.lexmorph.type.pos.POS".

featureDescription.name: tags
featureDescription.description: Descriptions of the tags belonging to this tagset.
